original: 啟稟大人，下將招募<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>失敗了，此人肯定不是什麼有才之士，請大人寬心。(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: Master Qi, the general recruitment of <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> failed. This person is definitely not a talented person, please be relieved. (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
